programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: It's commitment crunch time as the vow renewals continue. One emotional groom questions whether he's enough, and a couple decide whether long-distance can work.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK: Reunion
programme.desc: Reunion: Brand new series - It's the reunion dinner party and in true MAFS style, across-the-table action is served as two brides clash. And one groom faces a reckoning!

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK: Reunion
programme.desc: Reunion: Brand new series - In the reunion Commitment Ceremony, some couples celebrate their journeys, others confront their issues, and one final admission rocks the group.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Celebration Experimentation: The gang persuade Sheldon to celebrate his birthday and invite a few special guests along to his party, in the 200th episode.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Application Deterioration: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard run into problems when they file for a patent. Emily reaches out to Raj after their break-up.

programme.title: The Great New Year Bake Off
programme.desc: Another chance to see familiar faces Maxy, JÃ¼rgen, Maggie and Mark compete to win the first Star Baker of 2024, before they see the New Year in with a performance from Bone-Afide.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Peeping Mom: Bart lies to cover up his role in a bulldozer crash, so Marge decides to follow him everywhere until he confesses. Ned's cute new dog loves Homer.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Kids Are All Fight: When Homer finds an old roll of film and has it developed, the family take a trip down memory lane to when Bart and Lisa were always fighting.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost...
programme.desc: ...Protocol: (2011) Part four of the Tom Cruise action-thriller franchise. The Impossible Missions Force fight to clear their name, while also trying to avert nuclear war. Busy, busy, busy!

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The shows this time include After Life, Britain's Got Talent, The Andrew Marr Show with Michael Gove, First Dates Hotel, and BBC Breakfast on Eurovision.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: This time on the Box: Heartstopper, Made in Chelsea, The Circle, Bee Czar, Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars, and BBC News (local elections/Keir Starmer Beergate).

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: Teens
programme.desc: Brand new series: In this youthful mouthful, five teenagers compete to win Â£1000. Aminah rolls out the red carpet for an Oscar-themed evening. Can she deliver a winning performance? (Ep1/5)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: Teens
programme.desc: Brand new series: Ben hopes that his menu of family faves will impress, as long as he figures out how to work the oven! After a slow start, can he salvage his night and bag the win? (Ep2/5)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: Teens
programme.desc: Brand new series: Letty treats her guests to a night of Italian feasting. Can she deliver a slice of la dolce vita, or will her cake be more of a red flag than the Italian flag? (Ep3/5)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: Teens
programme.desc: Brand new series: Beatle-maniac Zach hosts a music-inspired night. But when a guest launches a fork at the table, can Zach compose himself and serve up a musical masterpiece? (Ep4/5)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: Teens
programme.desc: Brand new series: Alex goes all-out by making absolutely everything from scratch. Will the fruits of his labour pay off with his dessert, or will he crumble under the pressure? (Ep5/5)

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Dad Band: When Dave's amateur band loses its singer before a gig, Tina offers to fill in. But her high standards are out of tune with the group.

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Dillon opens up to Frankie, but a shocking proposal leaves him stunned. Darren continues to protest his innocence, Cleo struggles to adapt to motherhood, and Warren offers Mercedes support.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Cleo struggles to adapt to motherhood and turns to Sienna for support. Tensions rise in the Hutchinson family, and a resident faces a heartbreaking decision.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Warren offers Mercedes support following her recent loss. Frankie's nervous about her date. And a mother is shaken when she sees the anger in her son's eyes...

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Mill Street Bistro (Part 2/2): In the conclusion to the Mill Street Bistro saga, Gordon's disagreement with the proprietor erupts into one of his most intense confrontations.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK: Reunion
programme.desc: Reunion: Brand new series - In the reunion Commitment Ceremony, some couples celebrate their journeys, others confront their issues, and one final admission rocks the group.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Penny-Wiseguys: When mobster Fat Tony has to do jury service, he puts mild-mannered accountant Dan Gillick (voiced by Steve Carell) in charge of his criminal organisation.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Platonic Permutation: At Thanksgiving, Sheldon and Amy hang out as friends at the aquarium, and Howard reluctantly agrees to volunteer at a soup kitchen.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Earworm Reverberation: Sheldon is driven to distraction when he can't get a familiar tune out of his head. Howard and Raj find out that their band has a fan.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: And One to Grow On: Phil tricks Luke into taking a dance class, but the joke's on him when the white lie indirectly lands him in the slammer.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Under Pressure: The high school open house puts the parents in a time warp when Claire gets stressed out by all the pressure. Jay teaches Phil how to play truant.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Jerusalem Duality: Sheldon's confidence is shaken to the core by a 15-year-old physicist who is clearly much brighter than him.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bat Jar Conjecture: Sheldon is ousted from the gang's Physics Bowl quiz team, so he decides to prove his superiority by forming his own team for the event.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Nerdvana Annihilation: When Penny makes fun of Leonard's habit of collecting goofy memorabilia, his friends kick up a fuss and try to keep him on the side of the nerds.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Shiksa Indeterminacy: Leonard, Raj and Howard all fall heavily for Sheldon's twin sister, but when Leonard comes up with a plan to win her heart, it's derailed by Sheldon.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Pilot: The first ever episode of the prequel to The Big Bang Theory. Gifted nine-year-old Sheldon Cooper doesn't find it easy growing up in East Texas.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Rockets, Communists, and the Dewey Decimal System: To appease his worried mother, Sheldon employs techniques from a self-help book to try to make a friend.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Gorgeous Grampa: The family discover that Grampa used to be a top wrestler. And Mr Burns - a big fan - convinces him to get back in the ring...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Black-Eyed, Please: Flanders loses his cool when his laid-back parents start to prefer Homer's company to his own. Lisa is bullied by her new substitute teacher (Tina Fey).

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK: Reunion
programme.desc: Reunion: Brand new series - In the reunion Commitment Ceremony, some couples celebrate their journeys, others confront their issues, and one final admission rocks the group.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: Cheeky original clips featuring ducks going up an escalator, animal impressions, a few narrow escapes on a snowboard and rally driving. Plus: an energy drink house prank and a butcher rap.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: I Love Lisa: On Valentine's Day, Lisa takes pity on Ralph and gives him a card. But when he falls in love with her, it leads to a bitter feud between their families.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Duffless: Homer fails a breathalyser test while driving home from the Duff brewery and has to quit drinking for a month.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The walls are closing in on Lucas, Dodger struggles to hide his emotions at work, and Diane gets more and more concerned about her child's behaviour.

programme.title: New: Animal Control
programme.desc: Brand new series - Raccoons and Mutts: US sitcom about a group of animal control workers who find humans are the most complicated part of their lives. Shred wallows over Emily.

programme.title: America's Next Top Model
programme.desc: Franca Sozzani: The final four contestants meet with Vogue Italia's editor-in-chief, before getting a nasty shock when they learn that a double elimination is looming...

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers tune in to Eurovision, Beat the Chasers, The Queen's Platinum Jubilee Celebration, The Repair Shop, Drag Me to Hell and ITV News on the Jubilee pudding.

programme.title: New: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Brand new series: Jazz and Jules reach breaking point in a tearful confrontation. Chuggs clashes with Sam Prince. And emotions run high as everyone rallies round Sam Vanderpump.

programme.title: The Creator
programme.desc: (2023) Sci-fi extravaganza starring John David Washington. An undercover operative must destroy a superweapon in a war against AI. But the superweapon looks like a little girl.

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: (2020) Groundhog day shoot 'em up with Frank Grillo, Naomi Watts and Mel Gibson. Ray gets killed every day. Can he escape by unravelling the mystery of why a bunch of people want him dead?

programme.title: Klokkenluider
programme.desc: (2022) Neil Maskell's comedy thriller with Tom Burke and Jenna Coleman. Two whistleblowers are stuck in a house with only their bickering security. And their story may not even have merit!

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: (1973) Can Sinbad stop a master magician from reaching the Fountain of Destiny on the lost land of Lemuria and being crowned the new leader of Marabia?

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: (2014) Jamie Foxx stars in this reboot of the 1982 musical. Orphan Annie is transported to post-2008 recession-hit New York, where she becomes the ward of a germaphobe running for mayor.

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: (1989) Star-studded tragi-comedy with Julia Roberts, Daryl Hannah, Dolly Parton and more. Six Southern belles console and cajole each other through life in a Louisiana beauty parlour.

programme.title: Ex Machina Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Alex Garland and stars Domhnall Gleeson and Alicia Vikander talk about making their provocative sci-fi thriller.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: (1996) Blockbusting landmark sci-fi action-thriller starring Will Smith and Jeff Goldblum. A US Air Force pilot and a scientist battle aliens who are spectacularly destroying our planet.

programme.title: Ex Machina Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Alex Garland and stars Domhnall Gleeson and Alicia Vikander talk about making their provocative sci-fi thriller.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate
programme.desc: (2019) Sci-fi action sequel with Linda Hamilton and Arnold Schwarzenegger. A factory worker is targeted by deadly robot assassins from the future. Thank goodness he's back.

programme.title: Infinity Pool
programme.desc: (2023) Brandon Cronenberg's intense psychological horror with Alexander SkarsgÃ¥rd and Mia Goth. When a rich tourist accidentally kills someone, he gets cloned to avoid the death penalty.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: (2017) Festive zombie horror high school musical comedy. Anna and her friends slash and sing their way through undead hordes to reach their loved ones. But will they make it in time?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out...
programme.desc: ...of Water: (2015) Surreal animated adventure. When the recipe for Mr Krabs' Krabby Patties vanishes, Bikini Bottom is plunged into anarchy. So SpongeBob sets out to put things right.

programme.title: Think Like a Dog
programme.desc: (2020) Cheeky comedy with Megan Fox. A young science prodigy (Gabriel Bateman) invents a piece of tech that lets him and his pet dog communicate with each other telepathically.

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: (1962) David Lean's Oscar-winning epic. Peter O'Toole stars as TE Lawrence - the charismatic officer who united feuding Arab tribes to fight the Turks in WWI.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: (2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: (2012) Sci-fi action-adventure starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Rihanna. When aliens land spacecraft in the Pacific Ocean, only the US and Japanese navies can save Earth. Violence.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys
programme.desc: (2015) Sci-fi thriller with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Emilia Clarke. Part five of the franchise follows Sarah Connor in an alternate timeline to the previous movies, as she takes on Skynet.

programme.title: National Anthem
programme.desc: (2023) Luke Gilford's beautifully-shot drama inspired by his book about the International Gay Rodeo Association. Charlie Plummer stars as a construction worker who finally finds his people.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: 100 Years of Deaflympics
programme.desc: A look back at the incredible sporting achievements of Great Britain's deaf athletes, and a spotlight on some of the medal hopefuls on their way to the 2025 Summer Deaflympics in Tokyo.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Saraband for Dead Lovers
programme.desc: (1948) Historical drama starring Joan Greenwood and Stewart Granger. Princess Dorothea marries the future king of England. But then she meets a Swedish count...

programme.title: Against the Wind
programme.desc: (1948) Spy thriller. Robert Beatty, Simone Signoret, Jack Warner and Gordon Jackson star as British-trained saboteurs sent to Second World War Belgium. But one of them is a traitor...

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: (1954) Crime-comedy starring Alec Guinness. A priest is tasked with accompanying a priceless religious artifact from London to Rome. But the prolific thief Flambeau is hot on his trail...

programme.title: Tolkien
programme.desc: (2019) Biographical drama starring Nicholas Hoult and Lily Collins, charting the early life and inspirations of Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit author JRR Tolkien.

programme.title: Men in Black: International
programme.desc: (2019) Fourth instalment of the sci-fi comedy franchise with Chris Hemsworth, Tessa Thompson and Liam Neeson. An alien-obsessed rookie joins London's Men in Black team.

programme.title: Vesper
programme.desc: (2022) Sci-fi fantasy with new-comer Raffiella Chapman and Eddie Marsan. A resourceful teenager scavenges to survive in a mushy and mushroom-y post-apocalyptic world of have and have-nots.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: (2007) Western starring Christian Bale and Russell Crowe. An impoverished rancher tries to earn some money and his family's respect by escorting a dangerous outlaw on his way to jail.

programme.title: My Kind of Town

programme.title: Trawlermen

programme.desc: Austin 7 Chummy/Triumph TR4A: Derek picks up a lovingly restored 1925 Calthorpe motorbike that he thinks is more of a work of art than anything ever produced by Picasso.

programme.title: Planet Earth

programme.title: Planet Earth
